text:
Hi all, Does HubSpot allow you to manage sitewide redirects? These are redirects that would typically be applied to every page on the site and therefore wouldnâ€™t be done manually.

Two examples would be: http to https - every page should redirect from the http version to the https version, and non-trailing slash URLs to trailing slash URLs - every page should redirect from, e.g. <http://domain.co/blog|domain.co/blog> to <http://domain.co/blog/|domain.co/blog/>.

Hey everyone, I wonder if I create 2 language variations of a page. One english uk and the other english us will HubSpot render the different content if the client comes from the us or the uk?
Thank you for your answer
